en.title: FusionExcel Making Waves In Manila! (1)
en.content:
FusionExcel's Philippines Presidential Director Pastor Arthur Medina recently held a Training and Achievers Recognition Event for his group at Kalayaan Hall, Club Filipino on 21st September 2009.  The theme for the event was "Building Power Networks For Hope For Children" and was attended by 400 very enthusiastic and motivated FusionExcel Leaders, Members and invited guests. VIPs who attended included FusionExcel Founder CEO Paul Ting, TV Host and Celebrity Cory Quirino, Philippines top opera singer and movie actress Pinky Marquez, popular singer and actor Mike Chan, President of Center For Arts Foundation and FusionExcel Social Entrepreneur Jerome Vinarao, International Superstar and recording artiste Jimmy Dee (who is also FusionExcel's Country Licensee for Guam and Hawaii), FusionExcel's Hope For Children Ambassador 9 years old Singing Sensation Clark Gamul , Shilla Salonga (sister of interrnational Superstar Lea Salonga). Also attending were 4 TV Channels, GMA Channel 7, NBN Channel 4, TBC Channel 13 and CS Channel 9 who were there to record the event and interviews with Paul Ting, Pastor Art and Jerome Vinarao on FusionExcel's "Hope For Children" Charity Program.

Highlights Of The Event Include:

- Speech and Sharing by Presidential Director Pastor Art Medina. As usual, Art, you are an inspiration! We are so proud of what you have achieved. Much BIGGER things are to come with the seeds you are now sowing around the world!
   
- Speech by Paul Ting who spoke on FusionExcel's platform of Social Entrepreneurship and how it is empowering thousands, not only in the Philippines but all over the world! There is no better FusionExceleling than building a successful global business and at the same time contributing back to society. Social Entrepreneurship as practised by FusionExcel is taking root and is here to stay. FusionExcel is proud to be a pioneer of this movement that is changing the lives of thousands and soon millions of people around the world. A small step by every member, a giant leap for HUMANITY!
   
- Speech and Sharing by FusionExcel's Social Entrepreneur and President of the Center For Arts Foundation, Jerome Vinarao. Jerome presented a video on "Hope For Children" and his foundation's upcoming 10th Anniversary Celebration called "Echoes of Dreams" on 30th November 2009 which will be attended by 10,000 people with many VVIPs and superstars including Philippines No.1  international superstar Lea Salonga (Lea is the star of shows such as Miss Saigon, Les Miserables, Jesus Christ Superstar. She was also the voice in the songs in the movies Aladdin, Mulan, etc). FusionExcel is proud to be associated with the Center of Arts Foundation and will be donating Pesos 1 million at the "Echoes of Dreams" Event as part of FusionExcel's "Hope for Children" Charity Program.
   
- Entertainment by the children from the Center For Arts Foundation. FusionExcel is proud to be able to lend these talented children a helping hand in building their future.
   
- Songs by 9 years old singing sensation Clark Gamul. The world is your oyster, Clark and FusionExcel will be behind you all the way to the top!
   
- Song by popular singer and actor Mike Chan who is also an FusionExcel member. You are great, Mike!
   
- Songs by Philippines top opera singer and actress Pinky Marquez. Wow, this lady CAN hit the notes! 
Very impressive!
   
- Speech and Sharing by Presidential Directors Arthur and Grace Tuason. 
We are honoured to have quality leaders like Art and Grace building with us!
   
- Recognition of Directors, Executive Directors and Presidential Directors. Congratulations!

A BIG THANK YOU to all the Leaders who helped organised the event, especially to our own tireless Executive Director Efren Fortuna who was MC for the event. SEE YOU ALL AT THE TOP!

AHOO! AHOO!! AHOO!!!
<Click Here For More Photos>
